summary.p: The Sort operator sorts all incoming rows. The Logical Operator column contains Distinct Sort if duplicates are removed by this operation, or Sort if duplicates are kept. A comma-separated list of the columns being sorted is contained in the Order By column. The columns are suffixed with the value ASC if the columns are sorted in ascending order, or the value DESC if the columns are sorted in descending order.
Sort is a logical and physical operator.

tr.td: Specfies wheter the Sort operators performs a regular sort or a Distinct Sort.
Specifies the set of columns being sorted.
